portfolio.name: School project Step into the jungle
portfolio.description: Step into the jungle (SITJ) is a guide for international students who are going to study in Amsterdam. the assignment was to make a website/app about the book

portfolio.name: School project Luna
portfolio.description: Luna is a product that helps children that are afraid in the dark. We have build a prototype and a website

portfolio.name: School project Albus
portfolio.description: Albus is a interactive device that helps children searching for a new book. They can interact with a avatar character (Albus) And he will help the children for a new book.

portfolio.name: Visual Interface Design
portfolio.description: Visual Interface Design is a profession that is primarily to master the visual. At VID, the assignment was to design a mobile app as pixel-perfect as possible. For example of the right colors and shapes. With this app you can search a book at OBA

portfolio.name: Arjan van der neut
portfolio.description: build a website for the carperter Arjan van der neut.

portfolio.name: School project Transavia Storytelling
portfolio.description: For this project i had to build a website for travelers where they can read story's. Also i made a story in graffiti style.

portfolio.name: Custom YuGiOH Playmat
portfolio.description: I made a Custom Playmat for my favorite card game Yu-Gi-Oh!. I added a few things that helps new player for playing the game.

portfolio.name: Web Dev Minor: CSS to the rescue
portfolio.description: During CSS to the rescue i had to creating something with only CSS. So I made a old school arcade game in a 80s neon style. I have used @keyframes and transform: perspective for the first time and working with svg.

portfolio.name: Web Dev Minor: Browser Technologies
portfolio.description: Nerdy shirt ink is made as part of a course from @cmda-minor-web 1920. In this course i had to build a website for all the users, With the core functions still work in (almost) all browser. Build the site based on progressive enhancement.

portfolio.name: Web Dev Minor: Progressive Web Apps
portfolio.description: With Discover Gifs api you can search gifs. Basis of keywords it will search any gif and generates a list with that keyword.

portfolio.name: Web Dev Minor: Real-Time Web
portfolio.description: During this course you will learn how to build a meaningful real-time application. You will learn techniques to setup an open connection between the client and the server. This will enable you to send data in real-time both ways, at the same time.

portfolio.name: Graduation project Rekenen in blokjes
portfolio.description: For my graduation project i created a learning platform for children. Rekenen in blokjes (Math in Blocks) consists of 2 environments.A student portal where children can do the exercises.And a mentor portal where the mentor can assign exercise and view the results of a student. Many thanks to Lerespel for helping me with my project

portfolio.name: Portfolio Redesign
portfolio.description: It was time to give my old portfolio site a redesign. The portfolio is build with the React Framework and i created a json server for API calls for all my texts and images. I'm very happy with the final result
